venue.name: Myles Standish State Forest Curlew Pond campground entrance

item.description:
The northwest corner of Myles Standish State Forest is little known. An area known as Sly Pond is shown on the map.  There seems to be an old trail out of Curlew Pond leading into the area. We will attempt to find it.

Meet at 8:30 to plan strategy at Panera Bread in the Shops at Five in Plymouth. (close to exit 5 off Route 3 on Long Pond Road.)
item.how_to_find_us: Far right of the parking lot

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Explore the Northwest Corner of Myles Standish
